players.name: Bob
memory: You: "Looks like Alice was taken out last night. We should focus on identifying the detective quickly before more damage is done."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and discovered he is the mafioso. We must vote for him to win."
Charlie: "Everyone, Bob is the mafioso based on my investigation. We must vote him out now to win!"
You: "Charlie, your claim feels too convenient and sudden. Are you sure you're not trying to shift blame because you're actually the detective?"
